categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Ralchio Nervi, born Ralchio Sargan, was a human male who served as a captain in the navy of the Galactic Empire, commanding a task force. The son of Vilola Sargan and Cacique Jans Coorsa of a clan of Confederacy of Independent Systems sympathizers on Gall, Nervi was Force-sensitive. After unintentionally killing Coorsa in a fit of rage, Sargan fled, marrying Lila Nervi and joining the Empire. Nervi served as a lieutenant in the 14th Sector Fleet, where he gained the attention of Grand Moff Ravik.
